name: Basic UDP Client and NodeJS UDP Server
name_original: Basic UDP Client and NodeJS UDP Server
description:
Basic UDP Socket Client is powerful Unity tool created special for high performance multiplayer online games.
UDP sockets are much faster than TCP sockets like websockets or socket.io librarys.
Basic UDP Socket Client uses the low latency of the sockets in UDP, 
which are responsible for the communication of the applications running in devices and different operating systems.


 The tool can be used for various purposes combined with any other programming language besides C #. 
Create your own mmorpg today!
